articles.content: The article discusses three stocks that have turned a $1,000 initial investment into $1 million or more: Amazon, Apple, and Home Depot. It analyzes the growth and performance of these companies, highlighting their dominant market positions and strong financial profiles.

articles.title: Is Affirm Holdings a Millionaire Maker?
articles.content: Affirm, a Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) company, is emerging as a major player in the rapidly growing BNPL market. The company has partnered with leading consumer-facing companies and is executing well on user growth, merchant expansion, and transaction engagement. Affirm's strong leadership, effective underwriting, and product innovation make it an attractive investment opportunity, though its current $22 billion valuation may limit its millionaire-making potential in the near term.

articles.title: 1 Growth Stock Down 60% to Buy Right Now
articles.content: Roblox has emerged as a compelling stock market comeback story, with its growth reaccelerating and reaching a record number of worldwide users. The company's unique business model, expanding user base, and improving financial position suggest the rally could continue into 2025 and beyond.

articles.title: Warren Buffett Has Sold $133 Billion Worth of Stock in 2024 So Far, but This Small $550 Million Purchase Is Sending a Big Message to Investors
articles.content: Warren Buffett has sold $133 billion worth of stocks in 2024, but his $550 million purchase of Domino's Pizza suggests there are opportunities in smaller companies that may be undervalued.
